original_text: And as soon as Jeroboam the son of Nebat heard of it (for he was in Egypt, where he had fled from King Solomon), then Jeroboam returned from Egypt.
korean_text: 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 전에 솔로몬 왕의 낯을 피하여 애굽으로 도망하여 있었더니 이 일을 듣고 여로보암이 애굽에서부터 돌아오매

sentences.original_text: And as soon as Jeroboam the son of Nebat heard of it
sentences.korean_translation: 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 그 소식을 듣자마자

sentences.original_text: where he had fled from King Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 솔로몬 왕에게서 도망쳐 왔던 곳입니다
